{"title": "Heim", "title_search": "heim", "title_keyword": "heim", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/heim/", "summary": "Heim is an indie puzzle adventure game inspired by Norse mythology. An unexpected visitor turns Ashyr's homelife upside down, bringing him into a mystical adventure that takes him to far-off places and different worlds. Use your wits and acquire magical abilities to regain your home!
